body: Ok so I logged on to avicus and then I randomly got kicked for an old infraction I got. And then I logged back in and all of my infractions were in chat. And it just happened again. Wtf is going on. I just randomly get kicked for a previous infraction. This is weird.
body_tagged: Ok so I logged on to avicus and then I randomly got kicked for an old infraction I got. And then I logged back in and all of my infractions were in chat. And it just happened again. Wtf is going on. I just randomly get kicked for a previous infraction. This is weird.
title: This is weird.

replies.body: This is a glitch, please ignore it :)
replies.body_tagged: This is a glitch, please ignore it :)

replies.body:
Don't worry about this. It is a glitch and the Devs are well aware of the problem.

We are trying our best to fix it, so just be patient for the time being. :)
